file_content.text: We must do everything to ensure Kuat Drive Yards remains in Republic control. Good luck out there.
The First Fleet is on high alert status.
There you are! I was told of your arrival. Fleet Admiral Bey'wan Aygo. You honor me.
Most fortunate, your timing, but before we get into that: I take it you're aware of the importance of Kuat Drive Yards?
Kuat provides the Republic with the bulk of its ships. I'm here to see that arrangement doesn't change.
That's why I came.
I knew you were connected, but to have learned of recent events and be here already--I don't impress easy, but well done.
I try to stay up on these things; bring me up to speed.
Remind me.
Since the dawn of the Republic, Kuat Drive Yards has been the exclusive supplier of many of our greatest warships.
Without Kuat to make and repair our fleets, we're vulnerable. Give the planet to the Imperials, and we're finished.
I was told there'd be Imperial heads to crack. That's why I'm here.
Don't care. Just let me fight.
Surprising point of view from a Jedi--not that I have any qualms. By all means, crack away.
Good news: You won't have to wait very long.
As we speak, the Imps are mounting an attack on Kuat's main defensive control station. Their starfighters have also targeted related assets in Kuati space.
Are you asking for help with the space station, or out there in a ship?
I need to get back to it now, but on behalf of the Republic First Fleet, thank you. May the Force be with us.
I'll take your assistance however you'd like to provide it. Bottom line: we can't let the Empire take that station, and we won't.
Scramble all ships defending platforms fifty through seventy five. The Imps won't stand a chance.
Tell the Minedrome squad leader to stand by for revised objectives. Those Imps won't know what hit them!
Some of our own have been taken alive, and I'm sure you can guess how Imps treat their prisoners. Let's get them to safety!
Imps are using the station's defensive ordnance to fire at our fleet. We need to take control of those cannons!
In the unlikely event that we lose here, details of Kuati fighter production will be vital for the Republic going forward. Get what data you can.
All of Kuat will be in danger if the Imps sabotage that station's power core. Need to keep them at bay!
If the Imps get hold of that station's weapons cache, we're done for. There's no time for a reclamation crew, so start smashing!
The Imps need this hangar to bring in reinforcements. Don't let them take control!
We've got a Sith Lord who thinks he's claimed a zone for the Imps, but he wasn't expecting you. Go get him!
The Imps reprogrammed a company droid to attack our forces on sight. Take that thing out!
Reports are coming in of a vicious Imp trooper who's routing our forces. Show him what you've got!
Just what we needed. Great work.
With you on that station, we can't lose.
Notch another score for the Republic. Nice going!
Doing all of us proud in there.
On behalf of the Republic First Fleet, you have my thanks.
Way to go. We'll win this struggle yet!
